nodes.text: Panna was a planet in the Outer Rim's Tion Cluster, orbited by Panna Prime and two other moons.

Panna was a planet in the Outer Rim's Tion Cluster, orbited by Panna Prime and at least two other moons. It was one of the many planets conquered by the pirate chieftain Xer VIII and integrated into his empire.
Luke Skywalker first encountered Boba Fett on the planet's moon Panna Prime while returning a mystical artifact.
The location of the events in The Story of the Faithful Wookiee was the "Mud Moon of Panna", not the planet Panna itself.
